testObjectFilter

public void testObjectFilter()
Test the compliance for javax.rules.ObjectFilter. This test is testing the basic functionality of the TestObjectFilter. This object filter will be used in rule session related tests. This test creates two filters one filter is a Customer filter the other one an Invoice filter. Both Customer and Invoice objects will be passed to both filters and the results are checked.

Description:

  • Instance Creation
    • Fail: If the TestObjectFilter cannot be created and/or does not implement the ObjectFilter interface.
    • Succeed: If the TestObjectFilter can successfully be created.
  • Filtering
    • Fail: If objects are returned that are not part of the filter's pattern.
    • Succeed: If only objects that are part of the filter's pattern are being returned.
See Also:
TestObjectFilter, Customer, Invoice
